name: Slime Up!
description:
WARNING! its difficult! use the power of the coyote ;)

Slime Up is a dumb platformer about appeasing your poisonous boss. But you're a slimeball too so it's all gravy. Slime gravy. We wrote this 2 minutes before deadline.

Windows Version is recommended over Web!

Art and Code by @trashkev

Level Design by @papercavegames
